ygData.subject: Re: good vs evil unbalance
ygData.msgSnippet: I love the availability of Evil races and class s.  I like the fact that there are only a few places for us to run and hide.  It will make or victory that much
ygData.messageBody:
I love the availability of Evil races and class's. I like the fact that
there are only a few places for us to run and hide. It will make or
victory that much sweeter. And when I am sitting on the Throne...in the
city of Felwithe....Innoruuk himself will come down and cast the land back
into darkness. ::wow:: that was weird. I was taken over for a
second::snickers::

My one problem with playing an evil race or class is I(Dark Elf/SK) have
been killed before and seen Necro's killed just for being necro's. While
I understand that people will hate certain class's, but what I don't
understand is how they can tell you are a Necro or SK. An SK looks just
like a warrior...a Necro looks just like any other magic class...so people
that are class prejudice shoudln't be able to tell one way or another(IF
YOU DON"T HAVE A PET OBVIOUSLY). It just annoy's me that he can tell I'm
a SK and not possibly a warrior or something along those lines.

Korm
Cazic Thule
